name: Love
description: Ronald Tobias's archetypal plot centered on romantic love and the obstacles that test it
distribution_philosophy: Based on Tobias's love structure emphasizing the meeting, obstacles, and triumph or tragedy of love

attraction.name: Attraction
attraction.description: Two people meet and are drawn to each other, love begins to bloom

declaration.name: Declaration
declaration.description: Love is acknowledged and declared between the characters

obstacles.name: Obstacles
obstacles.description: External forces or internal conflicts threaten to keep the lovers apart

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.description: The greatest threat to love emerges, forcing a crucial decision

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.description: Love either triumphs over obstacles or ends in tragedy
